channel.title: I'm having a problem with death!
channel.description: when some1 kills another person or u die etc the person that dies gets to ekep stuff while his stuff also drop on the ground so its like a dupe example: player 1 kills player 2 player 1 gets the drop player 2 also gets to keep his stuff and also sometimes not the whole drop shows help!!!!!!!!!! edit: also when i make a jail it tbs the person but they login and out and then they can freely teleport so igo in to jail it says im teleblocked, but then i logout and in, and i get unteleblocked and can freely tele!

item.title: I'm having a problem with death!
item.dc:creator: @pure_kirk pure kirk
item.description:
@pure_kirk wrote:

_Vengeance:

iamguy, if you continue to spam about how noone will help you, action will be taken against you. If you’re finding noone will help you, it’s probably because the question has either been asked so many times, makes no sense, or is just utterly retarded. The best way to learn is by doing it yourself - not by getting other people to do everything for you.

i have searched and searched and i cant find anything -.-
